long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OpenAI Reply Generator is a browser extension, help you generate better replies (ie for Twitter, Linkedin, Facebook) automatically.

To setup:
1. Install OpenAI Reply Generator
2. Setup your OpenAI secret token (see instruction link from the extension)
That's it

To use, select a sentence/paragraphs from your browser. Then right click and choose "Generate Reply", it'll show you the response.

All requests history, API Key and other settings are saved locally on your browser. We do not save or capture any of your data.

Feedback and question are welcome!
